item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Education & Certifications üéì Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Certified Professional Data Engineer on Google Cloud Platform (2019) CREDENTIALS Engineer’s degree 2011 > 2016 ICAM (Toulouse) Experiences üë®‚Äçüíª Renault Digital - Data Engineer 2018 > Current Datamart and IA Creation from scratch of a datamart with 2 machine learning models deployed to production. 8 developers GCP, BigQuery, Composer, PubSub, Scikit-learn, Spark, Python, SQL Data replication on-premise to GCP Daily replication of 50 Hive databases (Hadoop) to BigQuery (GCP).
